Posts.Title: alot of pain lately chris1959 Bestbird

Posts.Content: Nov 27, 2013 11:58AM - edited Nov 27, 2013 11:58AM by Safetyyfirst Hi Freedom, I am looking @ your lovely family picture. Without a doubt you have a lot to be thankful for. Each morning I awaken, I have gotten into the habit of thanking God for my waking up to a New day. There are so many blessings we received before this dreadful disease and they continue. So when bitterness shows up or negativity tries to stifle your mind. Look at those beautiful Children and know you are loved and needed. How awesome! Wishing you and everyone in this forum a safe and Happy Thanksgiving P
